competitors.name: Microsoft
competitors.notes: Major tech company with AI/ML platforms in cloud services

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Major tech company with AI/ML capabilities in AWS

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Major tech company with AI/ML platforms and cloud

competitors.name: Dataiku
competitors.notes: Founded 2013, AI and analytics platform for enterprises

context: In 2015, enterprise AI market was in early stages. C3.ai (formerly C3 IoT, founded 2009) was among early movers. Tech giants were building AI/ML platforms while enterprise-focused AI startups like DataRobot and Dataiku were establishing themselves.
